Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a grey-brown slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394472) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394472)
